commit.message:
chore(project): consolidate Phase 2 work - BMAD v6, RBAC audit, comprehensive docs

Consolidated all outstanding work from Phase 2 sessions into single commit
before beginning autonomous execution to 100% completion.

**BMAD v6 Integration** (.bmad/ directory added):
- Official BMAD-METHOD v6-alpha framework installed
- Modules: core, bmb (builder), bmm (method), cis (creativity)
- Agent manifests: 25 compiled agents (YAML â†’ Markdown)
- Workflow manifests: 34 workflows across all modules
- Configuration: manifest.yaml, agent/workflow/task/tool CSVs

**Backend - RBAC Audit & Invitations**:
- Migration: c3a7b4bbf913_add_rbac_audit_logs.py (audit trail)
- Model: rbac_audit_log.py (tracks all permission changes)
- Service: rbac_audit_service.py (audit logging service)
- Service: invite_service.py (organization invitation system)
- Tests: test_admin_org_invites.py (invitation flow tests)
- Updated: auth.py, admin.py routes with audit logging
- Updated: models/__init__.py, services/__init__.py exports
- Coverage: 82.9% (exceeds 80% target) âœ…

**Frontend - Admin UI Enhancements**:
- UserManagement.tsx: Updated with latest RBAC patterns
- admin.ts API: Added organization invite endpoints
- Test coverage: Component test stubs added

**Documentation - Comprehensive Project Docs**:
- PRD.md: Complete Product Requirements Document (all 13 features)
- architecture.md: Updated multi-tenant architecture details
- development-guide.md: Developer onboarding and workflow guide
- project-overview.md: High-level project summary
- source-tree-analysis.md: Complete codebase structure analysis
- implementation-readiness-report-2025-11-10.md: Detailed status
- index.md: Documentation hub with navigation
- planning/documentation-handoff.md: Handoff procedures
- planning/prd-validation.md: PRD validation checklist
- planning/sprint-planning-phase3.md: Phase 3 roadmap

**UX Design Artifacts**:
- ux-design-specification.md: Complete UX design system
- ux-color-themes.html: Interactive color theme showcase
- ux-design-directions.html: Visual design direction mockups

**BMAD Progress Tracking**:
- BMAD_PROGRESS_TRACKER.md: Updated with all Phase 2 sessions
- bmm-workflow-status.md: Current workflow state (Phase 3 ready)
- bmm-workflow-status.yaml: Machine-readable workflow state

**Test Artifacts**:
- FocusTimer.test.tsx: Activity component tests (stub)
- NudgePanel.test.tsx: Nudge component tests (stub)
- backend/coverage.json: Latest backend coverage report
- frontend/test-summary.txt: Latest frontend test summary

**Project Configuration**:

**Project Status Before This Commit**:
- Backend: 663 tests passing, 82.9% coverage âœ…
- Frontend: ~1,066 tests passing (99.7% pass rate) âœ…
- Master Admin Portal: 100% complete (Phase 1) âœ…
- Deal Pipeline: Kanban board complete âœ…
- RBAC: Core infrastructure complete âœ…
- Documentation: Comprehensive (PRD, guides, specs) âœ…

**Next Steps (Autonomous Execution Plan)**:
- Phase 1: Verify Render deployment health
- Phase 2: Deal Detail Page (F-002 completion)
- Phase 3: Document Room UI (F-003 completion)
- Phase 4: Financial Intelligence UI (F-006 completion)
- Phases 5-12: Remaining features to 100% completion

Following BMAD v6-alpha + TDD methodology for all remaining work.
